Test Name: Histone Genes Mutation Analysis, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Specimen Type: Tumor tissue (FFPE block or fresh frozen tissue)
Purpose: To detect mutations in histone genes within tumor samples using next-generation sequencing.
Container: FFPE tissue block or cryovial for fresh frozen tissue, labeled with unique identifiers
Equipment: NGS platform (e.g., Illumina HiSeq/MiSeq/NextSeq), PCR thermocycler, Qubit Fluorometer, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with filtered tips, thermal cycler for library preparation, bioinformatics workstation
